text: Should a Wife Forgive? is a 1915 American drama movie directed by Henry King (who also stars) and starring Lillian Lorraine, Mabel Van Buren, Lew Cody, Mollie McConnell, Marie Osborne. ==Other websites== * Category:1915 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by Henry King
title: Should a Wife Forgive?
